body: awwsweet teenage love.The middle one involving the class pres. was great

The main story of the series was great. 

but the marriage one was stupid/ sad. She's a liar. she chose stability over love. she didnt love  him. it was just goodbye sex. bleh its hentai but shit like this happens irl. shame

The fact that TV fucking Tropes has a panel from this as a page image cracks me up.

https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SheIsAllGrownUp
All that build up of plot went down the drain
Also last 2nd story feels like treachery in a wholesome hentai way.

The last 2nd story felt like accidental manipulation, dude was believed she loved him only to found shes marrying another man for money and support. If this was taken in a satisfying/realistic way, all those "I love you" must've felt like lies to him

@SatchPangit Are they really siblings, though? They could be cousins or something...which isn't as frowned upon as it is in other places. It's not very common, but cousins can marry. Well, regardless, the guy should have just said whatever and left to go find himself and forget her. Let her see if she's happy then when her first love wants nothing to do with her anymore.

Except from the last two stories. This is a compilation of stories filled w/ pure love and defloration. Well, the last two stories still got defloration but only shown as flashbacks when they did it for the first time.

The last story ain't that bad. He took her virginity and her first love so he should be happy for her that she found a man who would love her as she is. Just think of this: He's her 2nd man so you still win as you're her 1st man, 1st love, 1st lover albeit unofficial, first dick, first creampie and it would never change although the 2nd guy still wins as she would bear his child/ren and be his until death. Well, they can't be together as they are siblings so it's the best outcome.
The last story is a whack. lol. They just had sex then will eat softshelled turtle which boosts stamina and libido.
